item.title: This is not a problem. Nigel the street cleaner is amazing, 12th December
item.description:
I just want to say what a great street cleaner Nigel, who works around Layard Road, is. Unlike most street cleaners, I have never once seen him on his phone or skiving in any way. He is always working hard. And always quietly friendly and polite. There is a lot of dumping of large items on his 'patch' but he tackles it and keeps his 'patch' immaculate. Please can you tell him that he is appreciated. And a bit of a local hero.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fenner Close, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 600 mm subsiding road otside 72/74 parkside ave, 12th December
item.description:
There is an area of road surface outside 72/74 Parkside avenue that is subsiding across the width of the road. I ride a motorcycle and I am aware it's there but it caused a dangerous change of direction and bottoming of the front forks on early encounters. It is alongside a street drain and crosses the full width of the road, Suspect a colapsing pipe. More dangerous in the dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parkside Avenue, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The poo is unbelievable and unbearable., 12th December
item.description:
Someone that lives on either Annis road or nearby has a dog and they do not pick up the poo. This is a problem..it happens daily, Hackney please come and pick this up as this is a serious health and safety concern. It’s been ongoing for a few months

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Annis Road, Hackney, London
